about: v1.0.Beta: Titan lists are at the edge of what the EA ruleset can handle, und the Collegia Titanica list is part of an attempt to make such lists less of a Draw oder Loss kind of lists.

A (very) partial change-list involves changes to stat lines (making it easier to engage Titans in CC, fewer DC, Shield on certain Titans), pricing (generally cheaper), introducing new rules (Feuer aufteilen to give the largest titans more flexibility und moves them closer to how things work in A-T 2018. The Gottgleiche Maschine rule to make it worth attacking them) und the Void Shield rule change (preventing big WE from completely recharging fully depleted VS mit einemsingle action).
